{"id":1304770472,"question_id":3490,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1719747711,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"119 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1304770472/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Maximum Length of Valid Subsequence I","memory":"94.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximumLength(vector<int>& nums) {\n       int in=0;\n       int jn=0;\n       int prev=-1;\n       int prev2=-1;\n       //eoeo\n       //oeo\n       int hn=0;\n       int pn=0;\n       for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n        if(nums[i]%2==0){\n            in++;\n            if(prev!=i-1){\n                    pn+=2;\n            }\n            else if(prev==i-1 and i==0){\n                pn++;\n            }\n             prev=i;\n        }\n        else{\n            jn++;\n          \n                if(prev2!=i-1){\n                    hn+=2;\n                }\n                else if(prev2==i-1 and i==0){\n                hn++;\n            }\n            prev2=i;\n        }\n       }\n       int maxm=max({hn,pn,jn,in});\n       return maxm;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-maximum-length-of-valid-subsequence-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
